CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	ACCOUNTANT                       	ACCT                       
B            	STUDENT                          	STUD                       
C            	SALESMAN                         	SALE                       
D            	PHYSICIAN                        	DCTR                       
E            	COMPANY EXECUTIVE                	EXEC                      
F            	FARMER, RANCHER, CATTLEMAN       	FARM                       
G            	GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEE              	GOVT                      
H            	HOUSEWIFE                        	WIFE                       
J            	TEACHER                          	TEAC                       
K            	PROFESSIONAL PILOT               	PILT                       
L            	LAWYER                           	LAWR                       
M            	MINISTER                         	MNST                       
N            	OTHER                            	OTHR                       
O            	UNKNOWN                          	UNKN                       
P            	ENGINEER                         	ENGR                       
Q            	CONTRACTOR                       	CONT                       
99999        	PILOT PROFESSION INVALID         	ERROR MESSAGE
